title: Yum and Yummer
text:
Yum and Yummer is an <a href="United%20States">America</a>n <a href="food%20reality%20television">food reality television</a> <a href="television%20show">series</a> that airs on <a href="Cooking%20Channel">Cooking Channel</a>. The series is presented by <a href="chef">chef</a> <a href="Eddie%20Jackson%20%28chef%29">Eddie Jackson</a>; although he does not taste any of the food so should be considered more of an advert than a review and features Jackson showcasing indulgent <a href="dish%20%28food%29">food dish</a>es from around the world.
"Yum and Yummer" premiered on February 10, 2019.
